name: React for Beginners
description: Learn the fundamentals of React and component-based development.

name: Data Structures & Algorithms
description: Understand essential data structures and algorithms for problem-solving.

name: Full-Stack Development
description: Build scalable full-stack applications with modern technologies.

name: Python for Data Science
description: Analyze and visualize data using Python and libraries like Pandas and Matplotlib.

name: Machine Learning Basics
description: An introduction to supervised and unsupervised learning techniques.

name: Database Management
description: Learn SQL and NoSQL database management with PostgreSQL and MongoDB.

name: Cybersecurity Fundamentals
description: Understand the principles of securing networks and applications.

name: Mobile App Development
description: Develop mobile applications using React Native and Flutter.

name: Software Engineering Principles
description: Explore best practices in software design, testing, and deployment.
